title: Shayan Mosleh
text:
Shayan Mosleh (born 25 June 1993) is an Iranian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player currently playing for <a href="Gol%20Gohar%20Sirjan%20F.C.">Gol Gohar Sirjan</a> in the <a href="Persian%20Gulf%20Pro%20League">Persian Gulf Pro League</a>.
Career.
Sepidrood Rasht.
Mosleh played for <a href="Damash%20Guilan">Damash Gilan</a> before moving to <a href="Sepidrood%20Rasht%20S.C.">Sepidrood</a> in summer of 2015.
Persepolis.
On 12 June 2017 Mosleh joined <a href="Persian%20Gulf%20Pro%20League">Persian Gulf Pro League</a> club <a href="Persepolis%20F.C.">Persepolis</a> on a two-year contract.
